articles.title: Japan's Former Princess Mako Is Working at the Metropolitan Museum of Art - Town & Country
articles.description: The former Japanese princess moved to New York City with her husband at the end of 2021, and she recently started working within the Met's Asian art collection.
articles.content: Mako Komuro, formerly known as Princess Mako, left Japan and gave up her royal title after marrying her college sweetheart last year. Mako, the eldest daughter of Japan's Crown Prince Akishino and Cr… [+2271 chars]

articles.title: Japan, Italy to lift defense ties amid China, Russia worries - The Washington Post
articles.description: Japanese Defense Minister Nobuo Kishi says he and his Italian counterpart agreed to step up military cooperation as Japan expands security ties with Europe amid concern about Russia’s invasion of Ukraine and its impact on Asia
